com.nokia.mid.ui.orientation
Interface OrientationListener

public interface OrientationListener

Listener interface for applications interested in orientation related events in the system.

The underlying platform will invoke the displayOrientationChanged method specified in this class for applications that have registered themselves to receive this event, whenever it detects a change in the orientation of the device's display.

See Also:
Orientation

Method Summary
 void displayOrientationChanged(int newDisplayOrientation)
          Called when display's orientation has changed.
 

Method Detail

displayOrientationChanged

void displayOrientationChanged(int newDisplayOrientation)

Called when display's orientation has changed. If MIDlet wants to adapt it's UI orientation in response to this event it must call setAppOrientation method.

If displayOrientationChanged does not return or the return is delayed, the system may be blocked.

Parameters:
newDisplayOrientation - constant value of display's new orientation.

The value can be: Orientation.ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT, Orientation.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE, Orientation.ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_180 or Orientation.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_180
